game.name: Streets Rage Fight
game.description:
You have got a wonderful opportunity today to prove yourself as a true fighter of your city. The entire street is full of people who are ready to attack you. Be alert as they will come to you from both the sides! Are you ready to take up this very difficult challenge? Join Streets Rage Fight and show the world that you have all a popular street fighter has! Nobody is there to assist you except your two own fists. You also have a few daggers to use to protect you from the enemies around. 
These ruthless gang of punks are everywhere on the streets. You cannot take a risk to avoid them. Go on the streets and kill all of them with the help of your powerful fighting moves in this one of the best action games for boys! Do not take your eyes off the screen otherwise their sharp punches or use of weapons will take your life in just a few seconds! Keep fighting with them until you eliminate all of them from the city in this html5 kung-fu game! 
Get ready to put your kung fu skill to challenge to kill all your enemies who are coming from both the sides of the screen! You do not have a time to rest. Enter and rediscover this ground-breaking battle and show the world that you are a real Kung Fu Master! Play hot fighter games online here on atmegame.com without downloading and keep the memory of your PC, mobile phone or tablet free for some other important work! Good luck to have fun and thrill simultaneously!
